verses.text: A Song of degrees of David. Behold, how good and how pleasant \add it is\add* for brethren to dwell together in unity!
\add It is\add* like the precious ointment upon the head, that ran down upon the beard, \add even\add* Aaron's beard: that went down to the skirts of his garment;
As the dew of Hermon, \add and as the dew\add* that descended upon the mountains of Zion: for there the LORD commanded the blessing, \add even\add* life for ever.
